name: Upheaval (Alex Leone)
description:
Alpha Version 0.0.1

In 30 days, the Magician will arrive. How will you spend your time until then?

Upheaval is an easy-to-play text adventure game set in a fantastic world of magic and danger. You play as an adventurer in a small town surrounded by wilderness. Goblins, bandits, spells, curses, undead spirits! What mark will you leave on the world when your adventure is over?

Takes 30-90 minutes to play each adventure. Play multiple times to learn more about the world and explore multiple endings!

Features
  • Over 30 unique locations to explore and discover
  • Non-player characters (both friends and enemies) are living, moving people for you to respond to and interact with, not just static encounters waiting for you to find them
  • Over 15 magical and mundane treasures and items for you to find and use, each of which can be used in multiple different ways
  • Over 5,000 unique endings, depending on your choices during the game
Alpha Version

New content is added with each new version. Get the alpha version at a discount today and own all future versions of Upheaval as well!

Warning: Save games may not transfer between versions during the alpha stage of Upheaval. If you're playing a game from a previous version and the game is crashing, please try starting a new game in that version.

Submit feedback for the alpha version using the in-game feedback button, using the feedback form, by leaving a comment below, or by emailing me at me@alexjleone.com.
